Posts.Content: ljh wrote: When I am warm or have a hot flash, I feel like I am being stuck with many sharp needles all over my body. I am almost 3 months out of radiation. Has anyone else experienced this? If so, does it go away? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: does anybody else feel this? ljh manos

Posts.Content: Jan 13, 2008 08:36PM ljh wrote: I am starting week 5 of a 6 week cycle of radiation. So far I am OK. A nurse told me that if I find sports bras and t-shirts irritating, to wear them inside out. That way the smoother seam is next to your skin. It is helping me.
Posts.Title: No wire bras JoniB Binney4
